member.name: T:Hyper.NodeServices.Client.HyperNodeClient
member.summary: Communicates with a remote implementation of the service contract.

member.name: M:Hyper.NodeServices.Client.HyperNodeClient.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes an instance of . This overload assumes the configuration file contains a single endpoint for the contract.

member.name: M:Hyper.NodeServices.Client.HyperNodeClient.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of . This overload assumes that one or more endpoints have been defined in the configuration file for the contract. At least one of them must have a name matching .
member.param: The name of the endpoint to use.

member.name: M:Hyper.NodeServices.Client.HyperNodeClient.ProcessMessage(Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.HyperNodeMessageRequest)
member.summary: Processes and/or forwards the specified message.
